card.name: Change of Winds
card.description: Look at the next 2 cards of your deck. Give them -1 {{COST}}. Choose one to draw. Send the other to the bottom of your deck.

description.now: Look at the next 2 cards of your deck. Give them -1 {{COST}}. Choose one to draw. Send the other to the bottom of your deck.
description.prev: Look at the next 2 cards in your deck and choose one. Send it to the bottom of your deck and give it -1 cost. Draw a card.
